title: John Boy and Billy . 21 Albums . The Big Show
description:
John Boy & Billy
21 album NV collection
457 tracks
August 2016

The first four albums listed are missing from this collection.
The rest are included.  These are all of the John Boy & Billy
albums that I know of:

       American Goobers
       Ike at the Mike
       Songs We Love To Sing
       Big Ol' Hairy Christmas
1988 - Economically Priced First Album
1990 - Head Cleaner
1991 - Straight, White & Southern
1992 - Big Ol' Hairy Album
1993 - Two For The Show
1994 - Love Ya... Mean It
1994 - Southern Exposure
1996 - Christmas Album
1996 - Dixie Diner
1997 - Silly Season
1997 - A Barrel of Laughs
1998 - Rocket Science
1999 - Country Race Tracks
1999 - Rockin' Race Tracks
1999 - Radioland
2000 - Freakshow
2000 - Nerve-Wrackin' Christmas Part 2
2001 - Best of Twenty
2002 - Rough Cuts
2006 - Potted Meat
2007 - Potted Meat Rides Again

I believe this collection along with the four missing albums
would constitute a complete John Boy & Billy discography, but I
could be wrong.

I edited the hell out of the Rough Cuts album.  Every track had
a WKRP effect of tuning across the dial, static and noise and
partial clips, and I just hated it, so I cleaned it up.

NV
August 2016
